Game.Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! - The Eternal Duelist Soul (USA)
Game.plot: You are a young boy destined to be the greatest duelist of all time. You start with one of three starter decks. You battle duelists in 5 different levels. Along the way you live in real time. Which means, if you duel once, one day will pass on the calendar. If you get this far, you could tournaments in certain months. Plus, you can unlock new booster packs with new cards. Basically, it is a usual Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. This game is only for the Game Boy Advance.Cheat: Monster codesEnter these codes to unlock these monsters.Cheat: The Card duplicatorTo Duplicate a card, First you must have another person you want to trade with. Then you both must select a card. The person who is getting the card must pick a card he/she doesn't want anymore. Then the person who has the card wanted must click "Trade it now," the person who is getting the card, waits till the other person gets their card back. Then the person who's getting the card must click "trade it now." You will notice that you now have the card you wanted, and the person you are trading with has their copy as well.Cheat: Get Every CardTo get one of every card not already in your possesion, beat Simon once. Cheat: Get Every CardIf you would like to play your duel at a faster pace than normal than, hold R button down and keep them held down during the paper, rock, scissors game and while decided who will play first. Once the duel starts you can let go. The game will now be twice as fast as normal.
Game.Notes: The most accurate, advanced version of Duel Monsters arrives! The ultimate duel simulator based on the hit Trading Card Game and Television series! Duel against dozens of opponents from the TV show or challenge your friends. Import cards from the Official TCG to boost your deck. Complete your card collection and create the ultimate deck to enter the World Championship Tournament!
